addr: Hobbs Hall. 325 E 111th Street. Los Angeles, CA 90061
title: NFL's Super Bowl High School Honor Roll Ceremony - Mike Davis
desc: As part of the nationwide Super Bowl 50 celebration, the NFL started the Super Bowl High School Honor Roll program to acknowledge schools and communities that have directly influenced Super Bowl history and impacted the game for the better.? Please join us as we welcome two-time Super Bowl Winner and Alain LeRoy Locke College Prep Academy Alumni, Mike Davis, back to his high school. ?Mike Davis is a Locke Alumni (Class of 1973) who played? with the Los Angeles Raiders from 1979 ? 1985 and the San Diego Chargers from 1986- 1987. He won two Super Bowl Championships (Super Bowl XV and Super Bowl XVIII) with the Raiders. ? The biggest play of his career, and arguably one of the most crucial in Raider history, was his playoff game interception against the Cleveland Browns in January 1981, where he made the game-winning interception on a play known as Red Right 88.
